# gov-grid

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                              | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Cell size as a fraction of 1/12 of the grid size                         | `string` | `'12/12'`   |
| `sizeLg` | `size-lg` | Cell size for LG media query and up as a fraction of 12 of the grid size | `string` | `undefined` |
| `sizeMd` | `size-md` | Cell size for MD media query and up as a fraction of 12 of the grid size | `string` | `undefined` |
| `sizeSm` | `size-sm` | Cell size for SM media query and up as a fraction of 12 of the grid size | `string` | `undefined` |
| `sizeXl` | `size-xl` | Cell size for XL media query and up as a fraction of 12 of the grid size | `string` | `undefined` |
